search.query: | tstats count from datamodel="risk_manager" groupby All_Risks_Events.risk_object_type
| tstats count from datamodel="risk_manager" groupby All_Risks_Events.risk_object, All_Risks_Events.risk_object_type | search All_Risks_Events.risk_object_type="$risk_object_type_token$"
| tstats count from datamodel="risk_manager" groupby All_Risks_Events.alert

| tstats dc(All_Risks_Events.risk_object) AS value from datamodel=risk_manager where nodename=All_Risks_Events All_Risks_Events.risk_object_type="$risk_object_type_token$" All_Risks_Events.risk_object="$risk_object_token$" All_Risks_Events.alert="$alert_token$" | eval joiner="joiner" | join type=left joiner [| tstats dc(All_Risks_Events.risk_object) AS trend_value from datamodel=risk_manager where nodename=All_Risks_Events All_Risks_Events.risk_object_type="$risk_object_type_token$" All_Risks_Events.risk_object="$risk_object_token$" All_Risks_Events.alert="$alert_token$" earliest=-48h latest=-24h | eval joiner="joiner" ] | fields - joiner | eval trend_value=if(isnull(trend_value),0,trend_value) | eval trend=value-trend_value
